title: Democrats Fight to Hold Oregon House Seat After Incumbent Is Defeated
description: Representative Kurt Schrader, a seven-term Democrat, lost his primary to a more liberal opponent. Now the competitive seat is up for grabs, with a Republican favored to win.
dc:creator: Emily Cochrane
media:credit: Celeste Noche for The New York Times
media:description: Lori Chavez-DeRemer, second from right, the Republican nominee for Congress in Oregonâ€™s Fifth Congressional District, posing for a photograph with supporters in Gladstone, Ore., last month.
